item.title: Pennsylvania’s Governor Puts ‘Green’ Messaging Ahead of Realistic Solutions
item.description: Josh Shapiro is telling Pennsylvanians he’s saving them a penny when he’s really picking their pockets.

item.title: Anthony Fauci Isn’t Science. Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Isn’t Health
item.description: A healthy lifestyle does not depend on one unimpeachable authority.

item.title: The Deep-Blue County Defying the Nation’s Rightward Turn
item.description: The country wants less government. Montgomery County, Md., wants more.

item.title: Democrats Aren’t Just in Disarray. They’re in Denial

item.title: One Man’s Quest to Keep Kids Away from Drugs
item.description: Rocky Herron, a former DEA agent, is convinced that it’s not enough to focus on the supply of drugs; we also have to change the demand.
